mapper.select: select count(report_no) from report_tbl where report_member_no = #{reportMemberNo} and reported_member_no = #{reportedMemberNo}
mapper.insert: insert into report_tbl values( report_seq.nextval, #{reportMemberNo}, #{reportMemberNickname}, #{reportedMemberNo}, #{reportedMemberNickname}, #{reportType}, #{reportContent}, to_char(sysdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') )
mapper.select:
select report_no as reportNo,
report_member_no as reportMemberNo, report_member_nickname as reportMemberNickname,
reported_member_no as reportedMemberNo, reported_member_nickname as reportedMemberNickname,
report_type as reportType, report_content as reportContent,
report_date as reportDate from report_tbl where report_member_no = #{_parameter} order by report_no desc
